mapper.insert: insert into driver( driver_name, id_number, user_id, expiration_date, file_number, driver_Pic, aduit_type, aduit_id ) values( #{driverName}, #{IdNumber}, #{userId}, #{expirateDate}, #{fileNumber}, #{driverPicUrl,typeHandler=com.xiyan.model.typeHandler.DriverPicTypeHandler}, #{aduitType}, #{aduitId} )
